scripts.prisma:generate: pnpm --filter fb-collector run prisma:generate && pnpm --filter ttk-collector run prisma:generate
scripts.build: pnpm run prisma:generate && pnpm --filter shared run build && pnpm -r --filter '{gateway,fb-collector,ttk-collector,reporter}' run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter gateway run start:dev" "pnpm --filter fb-collector run start:dev" "pnpm --filter ttk-collector run start:dev" "pnpm --filter reporter run start:dev"
scripts.start: pnpm run prepare:all && pnpm run dev
